Guys this doesn't have english as a language you can check the localization folder.

Alright, I'm in a good mood so I'll share how you can get english without redownloading the 14gb version. 

1. Add the 14gb version (digital deluxe one) to your torrent list.
2. Under the "files" tab right click the "localization/english.pak" and "localization/english_xml.pak" and select high priority.
3. Click on everything else and select don't download.
4. Copy the english paks to your localization directory of this download.
5. Done
Oh, also in the system.cfg file, change the languages to add english to the list and select english as the g_language
